text: Revealed : Katy Perry says she takes 26 pills a day, travels with a teddy bear, believes in aliens and has OCD Katy Perry clearly doesn't like keeping her quirks close to her vest. In a new interview with UsWeekly, the Prism singer doles out some eye - opening facts in the magazine's 25 Things You Don't Know About Me column. Among the humdingers : she believes in aliens, takes 26 pills a day and has OCD. And, endearingly, she admits she always travels with her teddy bear.
